episodes.title: The Bizarre 70s Cult Of Father Yod | The Source Family | Parable
episodes.description:
The Source Family are one of the 20th century's most mysterious religious cults. Emerging from a famous Hollywood vegetarian restaurant where Yoko Ono, Marlon Brando and Woody Allen all were regulars, the Source Family were not your typical restaurant-owners. Fuelled by rock & roll, they had a secret cult led by professed guru, musician and (vegan) bank robber, Father Yod. Influenced by the teachings of Yogi Bhajan and the astrological age of Aquarius, they practiced utopian living, until they were chased out of LA forever.

Subscribe to Parable for more Religious History documentaries!
